title: What is the best FLAC to ALAC converter? - Quora

response.answer_text: FLAC may be converted to ALAC without losses, when no re-sampling, re-bit-depth is there. If audio content is processed (resampled, bit depth is altered, dither is applied), sound quality of an audio converter is matter. Read details about sound quality: FLAC to ALAC [Apple Lossless] | Windows Mac.
